thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Fear the Index
Investors remained on edge ahead of a key report on inflation, despite major U.S. stock indexes logging gains for a third consecutive session. They appeared to avoid making any drastic trades ahead of the Bureau of Labor Statistics report on consumer prices. Further evidence of inflation will likely spark another market selloff. With the return of volatility, a U.S. regulator is looking into whether prices linked to Wall Street’s “fear index” have been manipulated. The Cboe Volatility Index, known...
